TextView.android:text: HelpOut is a a mobile application for enhancing personal safety and security. It is a cloud-driven and dependable application that can shout out for help on your behalf when faced with an emergency or an event of personal duress.Activating an alert will call out for help from all the users of the applications who may be in the geographical vicinity of the sender (may or may not be known to the sender) and also reach out; in whatever way-possible; to Guardians, the trusted few who will be pre-configured by you yourself.
We recommend you to view the Demo to understand the working of the application in Settings->Demo.
So go ahead use this app and be worry free :):)
